value:
{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20907v1", "title": "MANILA: A Low-Code Application to Benchmark Machine Learning Models and
  Fairness-Enhancing Methods", "summary": "This paper presents MANILA, a web-based low-code application to benchmark
machine learning models and fairness-enhancing methods and select the one
achieving the best fairness and effectiveness trade-off. It is grounded on an
Extended Feature Model that models a general fairness benchmarking workflow as
a Software Product Line. The constraints defined among the features guide users
in creating experiments that do not lead to execution errors. We describe the
architecture and implementation of MANILA and evaluate it in terms of
expressiveness and correctness.", "main_category": "cs.SE", "categories": "cs.SE", "published": "2025-04-29T16:24:48Z"}
